meanings.definition: Lexicologists: experts in the study of words and their meanings.
meanings.sent1: The lexicologists carefully examined the origins of different words.
meanings.sent2: Many lexicologists work in universities and research institutions.
meanings.sent3: The lexicologists had a fun time exploring the history of language.
meanings.sent4: She dove into the sea of words like a lexicologist searching for treasure.
meanings.sent5: The lexicologists' passion for words was contagious to all around them.

meanings.definition: Lexicologists: those who specialize in the analysis and compilation of dictionaries.
meanings.sent1: A team of lexicologists collaborated to create the new dictionary.
meanings.sent2: The lexicologists meticulously checked each entry for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The lexicologists joked about adding made-up words to the dictionary.
meanings.sent4: In the world of words, lexicologists are the architects of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The lexicologists' dedication to dictionaries was unmatched in the field.
